name: Animate Brick Breaker
description: you're the brick breaker paddle hit the ball with your brick breaker paddle as you can by breaking the bricks with the white ball when the ball hits the brick 1 time the pickup will appear get it before the ball hits the ground when the ball hits the ground you'll lose your life if lose all of your lifes its game over. If you break all of the bricks to score 20 you win so save your high score so you won't forget when the white ball gets to the top of the bricks hits it 4 times the other pick up will appear get it quickly before the white ball hits the ground
